snippet: Tatiana Golovin, who won the mixed doubles title at the 2004 French Open, is forging a new career in broadcasting.
abstract: Tatiana Golovin, who won the mixed doubles title at the 2004 French Open, is forging a new career in broadcasting, working as a commentator at the 2012 tournament; Golovin's once-promising career was cut short when chronic back inflammation forced her retirement in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Tatiana Golovin, who won the mixed doubles title at the 2004 French Open, is forging a new career in broadcasting.

headline.seo: Retired at 24, Tatiana Golovin Has Press Box View of French Open
headline.main: Retired at 24, Golovin Has Press Box View of What Might Have Been
headline.print_headline: For Golovin, Pain Eases But Never Goes Away
